This transition is a shift on a scale similar to when Intel IT shifted from desktops to laptops as a primary enterprise user device. 
 
Key Responsibilities: 
 
Accelerated Results Center (ARC), Primary Coordinator and Liaison: As our 5 Star ARC Coordinator, Hillary engages with both IT and non-IT development teams to drive them through completion of key artifacts of the unique ARC model: Complexity Assessments to gauge project scope and major risk areas; project charters to elicit each’s project’s Mission/Vision statement as well as lock down high level scope; user stories and requirements development to define the business needs; process mapping/flows development to illustrate how the needs will be realized in the new solution; architectural and design Reviews to capture and refine the as-is and to-be process models; solution validation and testing to improve solution quality; and transition change mgmt. (TCM) and user adoption activities critical to deployment.
